prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook offers rapid development capabilities, allowing users to build AI applications quickly. It also provides enterprise-ready features, including built-in security, privacy, encryption, testing, and scalability considerations.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
